original_title: I Guess I'm Not Going to Get to Vegas
overview: I Guess Im Not Going to Get to Vegas is a short portrait of Florence Sterling, who passed away from lung cancer, told through the stories and memories of her lover of over 40 years, Aileen. The piece explores illness, love, and loss through the relationship between two elderly Jewish lesbians who came out before the emergence of a visible gay rights movement.
title: I Guess I'm Not Going to Get to Vegas
